title: Confirm purchase feature in champ select
body:
Hey guys!

Just thought I would put this out there and see what people think. Recently I was playing Urf and was in champ select switching through all the skins for a chosen champ. I decided to skin boost and was scrolling through what I could have gotten and acidentally double clicked a champ skin and bought a certain skin! No confirm purchase option or anything. 

I brought this up with Riot support and unfortuantely cant refund me this purchase as all my tokens have already been used. I just feel like a confirm feature should be implemented to save others from the same issue.

Regards,
Squidy

replies.body: Well, it should've said in a textbox that you can now buy skins in champ select so you should've been aware but I also get what you mean and yes it should- to prevent people from first time purchasing instantly.

I have also noticed that there is no longer a confirmation box in the store either.
In the old client it used to ask you after clicking purchase, now it doesn't. 

Just an observation.
